frame.name: Circumscribed_existence
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Entity</fen> is understood to be experienceable within a particular set of delimited <fen>Circumstances</fen>, which may be more narrowly expressed by a <fen>Time</fen>, <fen>Place</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Entity">This type of behavior</fex> <t>occurs</t> <fex name="Circumstances">in several primate mating rituals</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Entity">Craft beers</fex> have started to <t>appear</t> <fex name="Place">in grocery stores all over the country</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Entity
FE.definition: <def-root>An object or event that is described as being available under delimited Conditions.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>A temporal characterization of the circumstances of the existence of an <fen>Entity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>A spacial characterization of the <fex name="">Circumstances</fex> of the existence of the <fex name="">Entity</fex>.</def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>A description of the state of the world in which the <fen>Entity</fen> can be experienced.</def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>Properties of the <fen>Entity</fen> as it exists in the stated <fen>Circumstances</fen>.</def-root>
